description:
Flow to trigger a standard Authentication experience, which includes:
Standard Username/Password Login
Passwordless Login
Change Password
Forgot Password
Forgot Username
Registration

aggregateFido.description: Aggregate FIDO device for Passwordless form

nodeDescription.value: If any process in the Registration Process fails, ensure the user is disabled.
Has the user account been enabled?
User had started Registration and stopped
Create the user and immediately disable the created account until the registration is completed.

annotation.value: Look at if the user is disabled, if they can continue to utilize their MFA device on the account, allow them to enable their account.
